dt-option.name: columns.searchPanes.viewCount
dt-option.summary: Hide the count column in the pane of a specific column

type.description: By setting the `-init columns.searchPanes.viewCount` option to `false` the count column will be hidden in the pane for that specific column.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init columns.searchPanes.viewCount` parameter is `true`, meaning that as standard the count column will be included in the pane.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will be displayed with the count column included in the table. However if the value of `-init columns.searchPanes.viewCount` is set to `false` then the count column won't be displayed.
The count column can be hidden for all of the panes by making use of `-init searchPanes.viewCount`.
This option replaces the deprecated `-init columns.searchPanes.hideCount` from version 1.2.1+. It was replaced to maintain consistency with `-init searchPanes.viewTotal`.

example.title: Hide count for the 5th columns pane
